content:
That sounds like a great experience! Portrait photography is a fascinating genre, and attending a workshop in San Francisco must have been a fantastic opportunity to learn from experts and network with like-minded photographers.

I'm curious, what did you learn about portrait photography during the workshop? Did you have a favorite instructor or a particular technique that resonated with you?

Also, since you've had your Nikon D750 since 2018, I'm assuming you've had a chance to explore its capabilities and features. What do you think about its performance, especially when it comes to portrait photography?

Feel free to share your thoughts, and I'll do my best to provide more insights and tips to help you improve your portrait photography skills!
